ygData.subject: Re: A few words about bards  - OT
ygData.msgSnippet: Me too,  The helmet for my race (human) is pretty dorkie so it is only recently that I started wearing it, in combat only.  To bad about the blackened armor,
ygData.messageBody:
Me too, The helmet for my race (human) is pretty dorkie so it is only
recently that I started wearing it, in combat only. To bad about the
blackened armor, it is just heavy enough and thin enough that I don't
think it is worth it. It looks great though. The one area where I
disregard looks if my weapons. Still using the pitiful looking
Dragoon dirk. (I just feel silly threatening MOBs with a sewing needle
in my hand...) Matched with a combine Scimitar it's looks damn silly
but I'm a quisinart(sp) in combat (with dual wield fast weapons are
imperative, IMHO) The Orange, er Bronze armor looks much better if
you can find some good arm armor of a different type. I use barbed(?)
armplates. The Water staff thingie looks great, I saw one this
weekend, but it's stats are rather low. Just can't afford the damage
loss.

Bujold, 19
dead and disgusted in befallen
xegony


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: [eqbards] BQ (Bards Quarterly) A few words about bards and
Author: Non-HP-lordartos (lordartos@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 8/2/99 7:08 AM


From: Llewrend Lynnhaven <lordartos@...>

So I've been running around in full bronze plate for a
few levels, when suddenly I look at myself and
realize, "Hey, I'm ornge". So I'm thinking of buying
a set of blackened. I hear it's less ac and heavier,
can any one verify? (yes I'm saving up for silver but
EGADS that's spendy) If it's not too huge a dif I'll
wear the pieces that show any way. Also, I picked up
a Water Crystal Staff this weekend in Lake Rathe.
Wanted to raise my 1h blunt any way, so now I'm duel
weilding it and a PGT, which looks awesome. HUGE
stamina sucker though. I get inspected a lot more now
too, seeing as how we're the only non caster class who
can use it, I'm pretty sure I'm the only person on E
Marr duel weilding it :). Any way, am I crazy or does
anyone else use lesser items in favor of how they
look?

Llewrend Lynnhaven
